title: TOLD MY

description.plain:
In “TOLD MY”, Future raps about his lavish lifestyle and casual relationships. He mentions his regular use of various drugs, waking up ‘higher than Jesus,’ and his lack of loyalty and commitment to women, claiming that if he were to be faithful he ‘might fall off.’

The leaked version of the song featured a verse by Gunna, which was cut from the official release.

embed_content: Read “TOLD MY” by Future on Genius

body.plain:
In “TOLD MY”, Future raps about his lavish lifestyle and casual relationships. He mentions his regular use of various drugs, waking up ‘higher than Jesus,’ and his lack of loyalty and commitment to women, claiming that if he were to be faithful he ‘might fall off.’

The leaked version of the song featured a verse by Gunna, which was cut from the official release.

Tom Ford, skinny pants, alteration, yeah (Tom, yeah, yeah, yeah)

Get it for the low, gеt it to the street (Oh, oh, oh)
Pay me top dollars, I'm a sight to see (Woah, pay me top, cheese, cheese)
I told my bitch, "If I gotta be faithful, I might fall off"
I put all my BMs on paper so they won't talk
I pulled up another Bentayga, she got a cold walk
I'll talk all the shit I wanna talk for a couple million dollars
